feed.title: Investbrain Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.1.0
entry.content:
While this new release does not include any new features, it does come with significant improvements to the Investbrain Docker image . Based on feedback in various discussions (particularly around K8s compatibility), the image has been optimized. The upgraded Docker image now:

  • Bundles pre-built front-end assets
  • Pre-installs all composer dependencies
  • Simplifies ENV configuration and entrypoint.sh

What's Changed

  • chore: upgrade composer deps by @hackeresq in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/49
  • Optimize Docker Image by @hackeresq in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/52

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.0.9...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.1.3
entry.content:
This newest release brings a major new feature: Investbrain API (docs)

What's Changed

  • feat: Add Investbrain API capabilities by @hackeresq in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/56
  • fix: Ensures storage path permissions are set in entry script by @hackeresq in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/59

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.1.4
entry.content:
This should be the last in a series of incremental updates to the dockerfile and compose files resulting in a streamlined self-hosting experience!

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4
